name: MX Desert
description:
There are many challenges in the desert that ready to test your skill in this arcade-style motocross game. Ride your bike through a countless of punishing obstacle and climb the leaderboard!

Features:
-> Challenging Gameplay Mechanic
-> Minimalist 2D Graphics
-> 45 Levels of excitement
-> Endless mode for endless challenge
-> Unlockable Bike's Skin
-> Hard, Addicting, Awesome
